title: 求救MC1.3.2版本安装动作mod后报错了
author: X小新X
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\Application Data\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-09-02_00.58.13-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT e62e8d38 --------
Generated 12-9-2 上午12:58
- Minecraft Version: 1.3.2
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 18733432 bytes (17 MB) / 54775808 bytes (52 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
- JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
- ModLoader: Mods loaded: 5
ModLoader 1.3.2
mod_SmartMoving 9.14
mod_TooManyItems 1.3.2 2012-08-16
mod_AnimalBikes AnimalBikes 1.3.1 v0.5
mod_ReiMinimap v3.2_05  汉化MCBBS_荧惑(NightWish)、月姬 [1.3.2]
- LWJGL: 2.8.4
- OpenGL: ATI Radeon Xpress Series GL version 2.1.8543 Release, ATI Technologies Inc.
- Is Modded: Very likely
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: Default
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
java.lang.NullPointerException
at ModLoader.onTick(ModLoader.java:1213)
at EntityRendererProxy.b(EntityRendererProxy.java:21)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.J(SourceFile:607)
at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:535)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 8e4df054 ----------
怎么解决？？  我是新手{:10_503:}

replies.author: X小新X
replies.txt_content:
strawmaine 发表于 2012-9-2 10:39 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-39781-1-1.html
ModLoader 1.3.2 onTick-fix.zip有安装吗？
没安装- -...安装后好了 3Q了
